title: Just lost another game due to entire team at high ping.
body:
Before in the day, my entire team got 200 pingd and then they disabled ranked.

No loss prevented.

Just now, in the final fight that decided the game, my entire team once again got 190 ping.

Yes, I assume the other team would also have gotten the same ping spikes. However, I don't think it's fair to say that it doesn't matter. It shouldn't be that the winner of a game is the team that has more players comfortable playing with an insane delay.

If I wanted to play games where I have a 1 second response time I would just play in EUW.
